description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

背景介绍：

Rgetting a thorough understanding of oneself. Are you often surrounded by negative emotions? Are you often ecently, a popular short video from foreign website touches lots of people. The video is about beauty, about confidence, furthermore, about particular about everything about yourself? Do you often neglect the beauty in yourself but just focus on that in others? I believe you can obtain positive energy from this video, more or less. Keep in mind that beauty is from hearts filled with sunshine and confidence. Just as the simple test in the video proves, you are more beautiful than you think.

话题：

1 Describe your feelings about this video and what you have learned from it.

OR 2 Tell us something about yourself? Find the advantages in you. Hope you can use a specific experience to finish it.

(Everyone has his advantage and should be good at discovering it. So don’t be shy, dear.)

OR 3 Create a descriptive paragraph of your appearance.

(Make sure to use specific, descriptive words. Descriptive words are specific and bring clear images to mind.)

范例1Actually, when I was a student, I really paid much attention on one’s looks, and even had an inferiority complex（n. 心结，情结） about my own appearance. However, after getting contact with more commendable（a.很好的，可钦佩的） people, the experiences and communication totally changed my mind. How stupid I used to be! How can I judge a book by its cover? With no doubt, everyone can have his plain but appealing face, the mother saving her baby in disaster, the policemen perishing in the line of duty in the violence, even the individuals who just discuss these stories. We may obtain the world with love, reversely, we can also lose the world with hate. So why not treat the world with optimistic mentality（乐观开朗的心态） and focus more on what you already have? You already have an awesome you,so believe in yourself.

范例2：

According to statistics, the real-name system in the Weibo application shown great process since the 16th of March, 2012: More than half of the users decided to forward weibo via their mobile phones. Carrying out the real-name policy will greatly filters out those artifical followers and invalidated news, which further creating a user-friendly environment for the publics. But, is it really so? Personally, I had been a weibo user since 2009, but weibo blocked my account twice for no particular reasons. Facing with the real-name system, it is also not fair for the minor users. Most minor and oversea users have a hard time to gain access to weibo, for verifying the real-name system by ID, driver license, and business card are inefficient.

范例3：

Blog real-name system is a double-edged sword. On one hand, netizen will not write whatever they want, such as rumors or cheating. On the other hand, it is actually the way for authority to control the freedom of speech. Once something spreading is not consistent with government, they can easy to find the source and suppress the discord sound in time. In my opinion, I reluctantly support the blog real-name system. The soul of the blog is the freedom, which attracts hundreds of thousands of people attention and the registration number is still increasing every day. Once the soul is deprived what could be remaining?

title: 英文天天写：130430 你比你想象的更美丽

description:
还在羡慕BBC播音员员一口地道标准的英式发音吗？想要练就纯正英音，《BBC英音模仿秀》帮你忙！《BBC英音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：Eva酱

26秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

Horace Kephart was the dean of American campers. He was a small, intelligent and honest man with one deep brown eye and one blue. His reputation rests on his compendium Camping and Woodcraft, which is from 1906. He was one of the most knowledgeable people about firearms in the early years the 20th century but as much as his friends liked to go off and shoot the bears in the woods, he really liked to stay back and cook in camp.贺拉斯·凯普哈特是美国野营者中的元老级人物。他不太高，但很聪明，又很坦率，一只眼睛深棕色，另一只蓝色。他的野营声誉主要来自他的一本《野营与木工》，出版于1906年。他还是20世纪早期的火器专家之一，但是尽管他的朋友们喜欢去林子里猎熊，他更愿意留在营地做饭。

语调示意图：

重点单词发音讲解：

dean /di:n/ n. 院长，主持牧师
intelligent /in'telidʒənt/ adj. 有智慧的，聪明的
compendium /kəm'pendiəm/ n. 概略；概要；手册

title: BBC模仿秀：☆130627 轻装素行宿荒芜 简餐易食享人生

description:
还在羡慕BBC播音员员一口地道标准的英式发音吗？想要练就纯正英音，《BBC英音模仿秀》帮你忙！《BBC英音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：Doris (lsy34)

31秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

But are we big enough to change the course of geological history? In the earth's deep past, great events such as the start of ice ages, titanic volcanic eruptions and the mass extinctions of plants and animals cause the planet to shift gear into new geological periods. They have names like the Jurassic, the Cretaceous and the Pleistocene. All these upheavals left many traces in the rocks forming at the earth's surface at those times, stories of global change written by the fossils and the chemical makeup of the strata. 我们是否有能力改变地质的历史进程？在远古时代，一些像冰河时代到来，猛烈火山喷发，动植物大规模灭绝的重大事件使得地球改变了步调，迈入一个又一个地质新纪元。举例来说，这些地质时期有侏罗纪、白垩纪和更新世等。所有的巨变都在当时的地表岩石里留下了印迹，全球变化的故事就这样铭刻在了化石和岩层的化学成分中。

语调示意图：

重点单词发音讲解：

change /tʃeɪndʒ/ v. 改变
geological /ˌdʒi.əˈlɒdʒ.ɪ.kəl/ a. 地质学的, 地质的
titanic /taɪˈtæn.ɪk/ adj. 力大无比的
volcanic /vɒlˈkæn.ɪk/ adj 火山的
eruption /ɪˈrʌp.ʃən/ n. 爆发
extinction /ɪkˈstɪŋk.ʃən/ n. 灭绝; 绝种
gear /gɪəʳ/
upheaval /ʌpˈhiː.vəl/ n.（突然而猛烈的）向上的运
global /ˈgləʊ.bəl/ adj. 全球性的
fossil /ˈfɒs.əl/ n. 化石
strata /ˈstrɑːtə/ n. （尤指）岩层（stratum）复数

小编模仿音频： 

模仿文本： Concerned about what it called "pedestrian circulation", Seattle's Board of Public Works came close to banishing street clocks in 1953, but a compromise was reached. 1953年，西雅图公共工程董事会为关心所谓的“人行道交通”而决定拆除街钟，但其中也作出了让步。如果物主承诺使时钟精确运转并且每年为其清洁两次，那么时钟便可以得以保留。这很快便使得街钟数量大幅度减少，但是西雅图的时钟量还是比整个纽约的多得多。

title: 标准美音模仿秀：121016 西雅图趣闻(2/2)

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

歌手介绍：

杰森·玛耶兹(Jason Mraz)，绰号男巫，美国创作歌手，以强大的现场演唱功力闻名乐坛。第52届格莱美奖最佳流行男歌手得主。目前杰森已推出三张录音室专辑，其中三专《We Sing. We Dance. We Steal Things》中的单曲"I'm Yours"最为著名，成为美国Billboard单曲榜史上在榜最长时间的歌曲(76周)，全球大卖810万张，为2009年全球单曲榜第三名，并获得第51届格莱美“年度歌曲”提名。2012年全新专辑《Love is a Four Letter Word》将于4月17日发行，首单"I Won't Give Up"已于1月2日释出，广受好评，顺利登顶美国iTunes下载榜榜首。

歌曲信息

今天的选曲是Jason Mraz和Colbie Caillat的【Lucky】，非常治愈心灵的一首小曲。大家在连续七天的上班和上课之后终于迎来了五一假期，一起来放松一下，分享这首轻松愉悦的歌，会吉他的同学还可以弹唱。

模唱片段：

Do you hear me
I'm talking to you
Across the water across the deep blue ocean
Under the open sky, oh my, baby I'm trying
Boy I hear you in my dreams
I feel your whisper across the sea
I keep you with me in my heart
You make it easier when life gets hard

I'm lucky I'm in love with my best friend
Lucky to have been where I have been
Lucky to be coming home again
Ooohh ooooh oooh oooh ooh ooh ooh ooh OOOOOO))  

音频讲解：

description:
《美剧天天秀》节目是沪江部落一档模仿类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语水平，在轻松看美剧的同时锻炼大家的口语能力。积极参与的童鞋还会得到主持的专业点评哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

原录音：

原文：

      Yes, I remember the world, every detail. And what I remember most is how afraid I was. What a waste! You see, to live in fear is not to live at all. I wish I could tell this to those I left behind. But would it do any good? Probably not. I understand now - there will always be those who face their fears, and there will always be those who run away.

title: 美剧天天秀：130621 绝望的主妇 S01E03

description:
本节目为沪江部落一档美语发音模仿节目，每期节目选取30秒左右的慢速VOA新闻内容，主持人亲自朗读示范模仿发音，对发音要点进行讲解，并配以详细的语音语调示意图，手把手教你练就地道美音范儿！想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人： cherryxyr
30秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：Hundreds of Malians marched in Bamako this week to protest the idea of ECOWAS' militarydeployment. The protest was organized by supporters of former army members who ousted the government. Many Malians say they are concerned that the army is disorganized and poorly equipped to take back the north alone.

译文：本周，数百名马里人在巴马科游行示威，以抗议西非国家经济共同体的军事部署计划。此次抗议是由推翻政府的前军人的支持者们组织的。不少马里人担心他们的军队组织混乱、装备不良，难以独力夺回北部地区。

重点单词发音讲解：

hundred /'hən-drəd/
Malian /'mä-lē-ən/
Bamako /'bä-mä-ˌkō/
protest v./prə-'test/ n./'prō-ˌtest/
military /'mi-lə-ˌter-ē/
alone /ə-'lōn/

title: 慢速美音模仿秀：代表就马里危机举行会谈(2/2)
